main.name: Pranav Kulkarni
main.occupation: Masters Student of Software Engineering @ University of Maryland (Fall 2018-2020)
main.description: I have strong interest in the field of Software Developement, AI/ML, Finance, Robotics and any combination of these. I am proficient in Javascript, Python, C++, R, MySQL and have an experience working in React/Redux, Node & Express JS, High-performance/Super computing platforms, PostgreSql, Pandas, Postman, Git, SSH, ArcGIS, ROS & Linux. I am currently looking for full-time positions from May 2020 in any of the following: Software developer, full-stack developer, React/Redux developer, Javascript developer, Front-end developer, Back-end developer, Python developer, C++ developer
main.bio: I was born and raised in a lovely city called 'Pune' in India. After my basic schooling there, I did my graduation from the Indian Institute of Technology Patna, India from the department of Mechanical Engineering (2012 - 2016). Currently, I am doing my Masters in Software Engineering from the University of Maryland (Fall 2018 - 2020). Apart from my strong liking towards Software Development and coding in general, I like reading books especially from mythology, mystery, science fiction, business/entrepreneurship & political satire genres. I also like watching good movies and I am a big fan of Christopher Nolan and Denis Villeneuve. Apart from all of this, I do enjoy playing chess in the pass-time.

education.description: Have undertaken courses in Software Architecture, requirements, Systems Engineering, AI Planning and Life-cycle cost estimation. Currently a graduate research assistant to Dr. Varaprasad Bandaru at Dept. of Geographical Sciences.
Received Director's 'Best Graduate Thesis Project Award 2016', Published a paper in American Society in ME and was selected in coveted MITACS Globalinks scholarship.
